```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(rprojroot)
root <- find_rstudio_root_file()

library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, cache = TRUE, 
                      fig.path = paste0(root, "/manuscript/figures/"))
```

```{r}
library(raster)
library(rasterVis)
```


```{r}
library(rnaturalearth)
borders <- ne_coastline(scale = 'small', returnclass = "sp")
```


```{r}
spp <- c("canescens", "macloviana", "magellanica", "maritima", 
         "microglochin", "allspp")
all.preds <- lapply(spp, aggregate_preds)
```


```{r}
futu.suitab <- stack(all.preds)
names(futu.suitab) <- c(spp[1:5], "all species")

```



```{r Fig_suitab_future, out.height='7in', out.width='9in'}
levelplot(futu.suitab, par.settings = viridisTheme, at = seq(0, 1, 0.1)) +
  layer(sp.lines(borders, lwd = 0.8, col = 'darkgray'))
```
